title: minerjones
author: minerjones
created_time: June 27, 2022, 03:36:51 PMLast edit: June 28, 2022, 10:47:28 AM by minerjones
content: Another fun mixed lot multi-coin auction!! LOT 1: 4x 2015/2017 Satori Chips (2x PreFork / 2x PostFork)#018881#018882#033641#033642LOT 2: 2x 2013 Lealana 1 LTC coins#6615 "LbfZAbKw"#6617 "LbfYQ9x7"LOT 3: 4x 2016 Lealana 5 XMR coins, redeemed#417#419#510#553LOT 4: 2x 2019 Moonbits Series M 1 BTX, titan finishM2510M2511*Each lot will be bid on and work as a LIFO system as seen in previous auctions**Can place your bids as follows: 1 @ xxBTC, 2 @ xxBTC, up to the maximum coins per lot**Winners will be able to select coins in order of win*LOT 1LOT 2LOT 3LOT 4STARTING BID PER LOT PER COIN: 0.0010BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT PER COIN: 0.0002BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: JULY 2nd, 2022, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOTIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made PER LOT, 5 minutes will be added to the that lot from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: Gatorelf
comments.created_time: June 28, 2022, 01:25:49 PMLast edit: June 28, 2022, 11:26:04 PM by Gatorelf
comments.body: Lot 1  1@ .0028BTCI am a little confused on this one If I win I get to choose one coin from the lot? and the next highest bidder gets the second choice etc ?thanks mj

comments.author: minerjones
comments.created_time: June 28, 2022, 01:31:45 PMLast edit: July 03, 2022, 11:16:26 AM by minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: Gatorelf on June 28, 2022, 01:25:49 PMLot 1 .0028BTCI am a little confused on this one If I win I get to choose one coin from the lot? and the next highest bidder gets the second choice etc ?Yes, but you are bidding on the number of coins per lot.You should clarify how many coins you are bidding on at 0.0028BTC for LOT 1.Can bid on 1,2,3, or 4 coins.Bid should look like 1 @ 0.0028BTC if you only want to bid on 1 coinIf 2 coins, 2 @ 0.0028BTC.... up to maximum amount of coins for that lot
